name: Radiotelegraphist
description:
Radiotelegraphist is a game with static scene and action. Communicate with other stations by using morse code. Break the code "Dielegat" from 1919.

Became a radio telegraphist, communicate with others by using Morse code and codebook. Spy on your enemies by using their station frequency and decrypt their’s codes using ciphers of the enemy.

You have to get through 6 days, each one is different from another and every day there is a different way to communicate with allies stations. Be careful, as days pass by this game is getting harder and harder.

WARNING! This game requires using Morse code, but we provided tutorial featuring everything you need to know about Morse alphabet.
